data.title: National TV & Radio Campaign for Dr. Ohhira's Probiotics®
data.meta_description: Essential Formulas is proud to announce a National TV & Radio Campaign for Dr. Ohhira's Probiotics
data.text:
In Support of our Retailers,

Essential Formulas is proud to announce

a very robust National TV & Radio Campaign for

Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics® in 2023!

Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics’ 2023 National TV Campaign

During January, February, and March 2023, Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics TV commercials will air across the U.S. onHGTV, the #1 Entertainment Cable TV Network* nationally in such high profile and popular HGTV shows as Rock the Block, Property Brothers Forever Home, My Lottery Dream Home, Christina in the Country, and House Hunters International. There will also be airing 6-7 bonus HGTV commercials per week for the week of Expo West and the week after.

Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics’ TV commercials will be seen by over 21 million targeted adults!

Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics 2023 Know the Cause TV Campaign

Throughout the whole of 2023, Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotic TV commercials as well as 5- minute interviews on both Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics and Reg’Activ products with experts Dr. Fred Pescatore and Dr. Ross Pelton.

The Know the Cause television show airs in many zip codes across America. The show also airs on various cable and local channels including: GOD TV & Christian Television Network (CTN) in addition to independent TV stations get TV, KGEB Golden Eagle, The Walk, WGGS TV, SuperChannel – WACX TV, Family Vision TV, Christian Family Network TV – CFNT, and WWOR TV.

Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics 2023 National Health & Wellness Radio Campaign

From January to December 2023, Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics 52-week Health & Wellness Radio Platform will reach over 143,500,000 listeners in 2023. That’s approximately 2,750,000 listeners per week that will hear Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics radio commercials. EFI is committed to aggressively keeping the Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics advertising message forefront with health radio listeners all weeks of the year so as to consistently support retailer sales nationally and locally.

Dr. Ohhira’s Probiotics’ radio commercials are broadcast in top-rated and very popular health & wellness radio talk shows across the United States such as:

Intelligent Medicine with Dr. Ronald Hoffman

The Dr. Bob Martin Show

The Dr. Bob Martin Show – Phoenix show

The Kat James Show

Forever Young Radio

Holistic Healthline Radio

Healthy By Nature Radio

The Dirt Doctor Radio Show

Conscious Talk Radio

HealthQuest Radio with Dr. Kolbaba

Doctor Health Radio

The Frankie Boyer Show

*Nielsen, NPM, 2022 Year-to-Date
